Projects.name: myCrypto Tracker
Projects.description: A Full stack application built with React JS And Firebase. Allows users to create a portfolio To record and track  their crypto purchases.

Projects.name: Workout App
Projects.description: A Full stack application built with Ruby on Rails. Allows users to create a workout plan for clients, Edit client details, exercises and workout plans.

Projects.name: Job Search Site
Projects.description: Simple site which takes job data from a JSON file, Allows users to search by location or job information.

Projects.name: Newlane FC
Projects.description: Simple Website for a local football team called Newlane FC, built with React JS.
